comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when change Y Axis type before binding data.

Build number: 
2.2.1.v20070913-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. Drag a chart from the Palette to the Layout.
2. In Format Chart tab, choose Y Axis node, change Axis Type.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
java.lang.NullPointerException

NPE is caused by the category axis control.
This bug has been fixed in HEAD. We only need to backport to 2.2.1 branch.

Exception should show up in Chart Builder if Y Axis Type is choosen as Date Time in the following case :
1. Stock
2. Bubble
3. Difference
It does not work in build (2.2.1.v20070914-0630), reopen.

(In reply to comment #3)
> Exception should show up in Chart Builder if Y Axis Type is choosen as Date
> Time in the following case :
> 1. Stock
> 2. Bubble
> 3. Difference
> It does not work in build (2.2.1.v20070914-0630), reopen.
> 

Your requirement to Stock/Bubble/Difference is not a regression bug.
Please file another bug, which would be fixed in 2.3.

Exception is thrown out when change Y Axis type before binding data.
Verified in build (2.2.1.v20070914-1302), closed.
